metadata.title: Turkey Face Shirt Thanksgiving Kids Adult Halloween Costume T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

Get ready to wear our funny turkey face t shirt design and gobble down some food this thanksgiving or christmas with this tee from our brand. Excellent for candy getting or for that next costume contest / party. Cartoon design.
Fun birthday gift for a son, daughter, brother or sister.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: An excellent and hilarious design for children and adults to wear this holiday.
